column4: Can anyone help me with mythtv on hardy? it doesn't seem to work with PulseAudio even after I followed the instructions here: http://ubuntulinuxtipstricks.blogspot.com/2008/04/mythtv-on-hardy.html
and does anyone here know if upgrading to hardy will break my mythv backend?
Do you have any experience with mythtv on hardy? My backend is hardy, but my frontend doesn't work on hardy.
